languages.text: {n}Древний сервитор кажется мертвым, и лишь судорога, время от времени заставляющая его голову вздрагивать, указывает на остатки теплящейся в нем жизни. Множество священных регалий-аугментов, внедренных в его тело, указывают на высокий статус и благочестие, присущие данному слуге Омнисии.{/n}

{n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitching of his head is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Древний сервитор кажется мертвым, и лишь судорога, время от времени заставляющая его голову вздрагивать, указывает на остатки теплящейся в нем жизни. Множество священных регалий-аугментов, внедренных в его тело, указывают на высокий статус и благочестие, присущие данному слуге Омнисии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The ancient servitor seems dead. A cramp that makes his head twitch every now and then is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

{n}The ancient servitor seems dead. A cramp that makes his head twitch every now and then is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

{n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitch his head makes is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

{n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitch his head makes is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

{n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitching of his head is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

{n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitching of his head is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}古代のサーヴィターは死んでいるように見えた。その頭部が時折痙攣していることで、わずかばかり命が残っていることがわかる。この万機神の従者の身体に組み込まれた数多のオーグメティック・レガリアが、その地位の高さと篤い信仰心を物語っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitching of his head is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}古代のサーヴィターは死んでいるように見えた。その頭部が時折痙攣していることで、わずかばかり命が残っていることがわかる。この万機神の従者の身体に組み込まれた数多のオーグメティック・レガリアが、その地位の高さと篤い信仰心を物語っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个古老的机仆似乎已经死了，只有头部偶尔抽动一下。这是他身上仅存的一丝生机。这位欧姆尼塞亚的仆人身上镶嵌着无数装饰性植入物，代表这台机仆拥有崇高的地位，是位虔诚的仆人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitching of his head is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个古老的奴工似乎已经死了，只有头部偶尔抽动一下。这是他身上仅存的一丝生机。这位欧姆尼塞亚的仆人身上镶嵌着无数装饰性植入物，代表这台奴工拥有崇高的地位，是位虔诚的仆人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si sa tête n'était pas occasionnellement prise de tressautements, ce servitor pourrait passer pour mort. Les nombreux augmétiques incrustés dans son corps attestent de son rang et de sa dévotion à l'Omnimessie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitching of his head is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si sa tête n'était pas occasionnellement prise de tressautements, ce servitor pourrait passer pour mort. Les nombreux augmétiques incrustés dans son corps attestent de son rang et de sa dévotion à l'Omnimessie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Este servidor antiguo parece que no funciona. La peculiar sacudida que realiza su cabeza es el único atisbo de vida que le queda. Las numerosas insignias auméticas incrustadas en el cuerpo de este sirviente del Omnissiah denotan su alto rango y devoción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitching of his head is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Este servidor antiguo parece que no funciona. La peculiar sacudida que realiza su cabeza es el único atisbo de vida que le queda. Las numerosas insignias auméticas incrustadas en el cuerpo de este sirviente del Omnissiah denotan su alto rango y devoción.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der uralte Servitor wirkt tot. Das unregelmäßige Zucken seines Kopfs ist das einzige Glimmern von Leben, das noch in ihm zu erkennen ist. Die zahlreichen Augmentationen, mit denen der Körper dieses Dieners des Omnissiah versehen ist, zeugen von seinem hohen Stand und seiner Frömmigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitching of his head is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der uralte Servitor wirkt tot. Das unregelmäßige Zucken seines Kopfs ist das einzige Glimmern von Leben, das noch in ihm zu erkennen ist. Die zahlreichen Augmentationen, mit denen der Körper dieses Dieners des Omnissiah versehen ist, zeugen von seinem hohen Stand und seiner Frömmigkeit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kadim hizmetör, ölü gibi duruyor. Başının ara sıra seğirmesi haricinde hayatta olduğuna dair bir emare göstermiyor. Hermesih'in hizmetkârının bedenine iliştirilmiş, sembolik sayısız ogmetik ise onun yüksek konumunu ve adanmışlığını gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ancient servitor seems dead. The infrequent twitching of his head is the only glimmer of life left in him. The numerous augmetic regalia embedded in the body of this servant of the Omnissiah speak to his high standing and devoutness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadim hizmetör ölü gibi duruyor. Başındaki ara sıra gerçekleşen seğirme, içinde kalmış yaşamın tek belirtisi. Hermesih'in hizmetkârının bedenine iliştirilmiş, sembolik anlam taşıyan sayısız ogmetik, onun yüksek mevkisini ve adanmışlığını gösteriyor.{/n}
